overview: You'd recognize the sound anywhere - the rich, deep bass voice, the clear resonating lead singer, the close 4-part harmonies, the excitement that only a Southern Gospel Quartet can create. Put it all together and you have the Cathedrals, probably the best-known gospel quartet.  The sound of the group has always been woven around the two creators of the group, Glen Payne - lead, and George Younce - the bass.  [Bill Gaither]
title: The Cathedrals: 50 Faithful Years
